io.goobi.viewer.managedbeans

Class UserBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.goobi.viewer.managedbeans.UserBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @Named
 @SessionScoped
public class UserBean
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Primarily for user authentication.

      • mustAgreeToTermsOfUse

        public boolean mustAgreeToTermsOfUse()
        Check if the current user is required to agree to the terms of use
        Returns:
        true if termsOfUse is active, a user is logged in and User.isAgreedToTermsOfUse() returns false for this user
